name: Great Escape - brain training game
description:
Fun Puzzle Game.
Help the caterpillar to become a beautiful butterfly.
Levels get tougher as you clear the levels.
An addicting game inspired from the classic game Sliding Blocks.
The goal is to get the caterpillar out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of the way.

MAIN FEATURES:
+ 3 difficulty levels – Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced
+ Get out the caterpillar with the minimum number of moves.
+ Undo system
